Package com.marklogic.flux.api

Interface Executor<T extends Executor>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AggregateJsonFilesImporter, AggregateXmlFilesImporter, ArchiveFilesExporter, ArchiveFilesImporter, AvroFilesExporter, AvroFilesImporter, CustomDocumentsExporter, CustomImporter, CustomRowsExporter, DelimitedFilesExporter, DelimitedFilesImporter, DocumentCopier, GenericFilesExporter, GenericFilesImporter, JdbcExporter, JdbcImporter, JsonLinesFilesExporter, MlcpArchiveFilesImporter, OrcFilesExporter, OrcFilesImporter, ParquetFilesExporter, ParquetFilesImporter, RdfFilesExporter, RdfFilesImporter, Reprocessor
    public interface Executor<T extends Executor>
    Top-level interface for objects that can execute some type of batch process involving a connection to MarkLogic.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      T connection​(java.util.function.Consumer<ConnectionOptions> consumer)
      Configure a connection to MarkLogic.
      T connectionString​(java.lang.String connectionString)
      Convenience for the common use case of configuring a MarkLogic connection via a connection string.
      long count()  
      void execute()
      Execute this executor instance with a default Spark session.
      T limit​(int limit)
      Limit the number of records read from the executor's data source.
      T repartition​(int partitionCount)

      Execute this executor with a user-defined Spark session.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        void execute()
        Execute this executor instance with a default Spark session.

      • withSparkSession

        T withSparkSession​(java.lang.Object sparkSession)
        Execute this executor with a user-defined Spark session.
        Parameters:
        sparkSession - must be an instance of org.apache.spark.sql.SparkSession. The Spark type is not used here to avoid adding the Spark API and all of its dependencies to the compile-time classpath of clients.
        Returns:
        instance of this executor

      • connection

        T connection​(java.util.function.Consumer<ConnectionOptions> consumer)
        Configure a connection to MarkLogic.
        Parameters:
        consumer - Provided by the caller to configure the given options object.
        Returns:
        instance of this executor

      • connectionString

        T connectionString​(java.lang.String connectionString)
        Convenience for the common use case of configuring a MarkLogic connection via a connection string. Requires that the associated MarkLogic REST API app server use basic or digest authentication.
        Parameters:
        connectionString - Defines a connection to MarkLogic via "user:password@host:port/optionalDatabaseName".
        Returns:
        instance of this executor

      • limit

        T limit​(int limit)
        Limit the number of records read from the executor's data source.
        Parameters:
        limit - Maximum number of records to read from the executor's data source.
        Returns:
        instance of this executor

      • repartition

        T repartition​(int partitionCount)
        Parameters:
        partitionCount - the number of partitions to use for writing or processing the data that has been read.
        Returns:
        instance of this executor
        Since:
        1.2.0

      • count

        long count()
        Returns:
        the count of rows to be read by this executor from its data source.
